item.title: Sharing your custom RStudio snippets over multiple computers
item.description: Snippet Basics RStudio has a feature that a lot of people seem to ignore (or don’t know even exists): snippets! Snippets are predefined shortcuts that when used will insert additional code into your documents within RStudio. You can activate them by using the syntax KEYWORD + Shift + Tab. Depending on your RStudio settings, if you open up a .R document and type for you may get the following:
